New Records: Rohit Sharma became the first man to five T20I hundreds
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma hit two sixes in the first Super Over
India won the match via Super Over after two Super Overs
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed relief after his performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the highest scoring game by Afghanistan when chasing
Others: The match was tied after the first Super Over
